name: Computer Science Engineering
description: The CSE department focuses on software, algorithms, and computing.

name: Information Technology
description: The IT department covers information systems, networking, and cybersecurity.

name: Electronics and Communication Engineering
description: The ECE department deals with electronics, communication systems, and embedded systems.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: The Mechanical department focuses on design, manufacturing, and thermal systems.

name: Civil Engineering
description: The Civil department covers construction, structures, and environmental engineering.

name: Master of Business Administration
description: The MBA department offers business management and leadership programs.

name: Electrical Engineering
description: The Electrical Engineering department focuses on power systems, control systems, and electrical machines.

name: Biomedical Engineering
description: The Biomedical Engineering department integrates engineering with medical sciences to develop solutions for healthcare.

name: Chemical Engineering
description: The Chemical Engineering department focuses on chemical processes, materials, and energy.

name: Aerospace Engineering
description: The Aerospace Engineering department deals with aircraft and spacecraft design and propulsion.
